html: Hate has no place in our country. Deeply saddened by the shooting at Congregation Chabad during Passover. I stand w/ the Jewish community to renounce the disturbing rise of antisemitic rhetoric that leads to these deadly attacks. My thoughts are w/ the victims & their families.
text:
Hate has no place in our country. Deeply saddened by the shooting at Congregation Chabad during Passover. 

I stand w/ the Jewish community to renounce the disturbing rise of antisemitic rhetoric that leads to these deadly attacks. My thoughts are w/ the victims & their families.

html: Join me on Thursday, April 25th for a town hall meeting in Santa Barbara! I look forward to hearing about your priorities & providing an overview of what we've accomplished in the first 100 days of the 116th Congress. Please RSVP to let me know if you'll be there!

html: Horrified by the murder of hundreds of Easter worshipers & tourists in #SriLanka during this sacred time for reflection & renewal. I strongly condemn these acts of terror. My thoughts are with all the victims & their families on this dark day.

html: Allowing those who are willing, capable, & ready to serve our country doesn't harm military readiness, it makes us stronger. For 3 years, transgender troops have served openly w/ no evidence of lack of readiness or unit cohesion. @POTUS' discriminatory #TransMilitaryBan must go

I'd like to thank Army Sgt. Merv Mullikin from Carpinteria for his service. His company was ambushed on a mission in the Binh Dinh Province in 1967 where 6 soldiers were killed. It was an honor to present him w/ his long overdue Bronze Star Medal 50 years after his return home.pic.twitter.com/sfxIZ2kper

html: I agree the terms of the INF are outdated & we cannot allow Russia to cheat w/o consequences. But when we consider what's at stake (a nuclear arms race) I believe we must hold Russia & China accountable by renegotiating the terms, not scrap it while making no effort to replace it
text: I agree the terms of the INF are outdated & we cannot allow Russia to cheat w/o consequences. But when we consider what's at stake (a nuclear arms race) I believe we must hold Russia & China accountable by renegotiating the terms, not scrap it while making no effort to replace it

html: The Administration argues that because Russia is violating the terms of the INF agreement and because China was not a part of the treaty in 1987, we should abandon it completely. I think this is a mistake.
text:
The Administration argues that because Russia is violating the terms of the INF agreement and because China was not a part of the treaty in 1987, we should abandon it completely. 

I think this is a mistake.

html: Like many Americans, I was deeply concerned when @realDonaldTrump announced his intention to withdraw from the INF Treaty – a landmark 1987 nuclear arms-control agreement President Reagan signed w/ Russia toward the end of the Cold War.
text: Like many Americans, I was deeply concerned when @realDonaldTrump announced his intention to withdraw from the INF Treaty – a landmark 1987 nuclear arms-control agreement President Reagan signed w/ Russia toward the end of the Cold War.

html: I visited Alabama this weekend, where I was greeted with open arms & their famously warm Southern hospitality. My thoughts are with those all those affected by this terrible tragedy.
text: I visited Alabama this weekend, where I was greeted with open arms & their famously warm Southern hospitality. My thoughts are with those all those affected by this terrible tragedy.

html: Politics should never affect the quality of our response to natural disasters. Not in California. Not in Puerto Rico. And not in Alabama.
text: Politics should never affect the quality of our response to natural disasters. Not in California. Not in Puerto Rico. And not in Alabama.

html: Alabama deserves an A+ federal response after deadly tornadoes sadly took 23 lives yesterday. But POTUS has not applied this urgency to all natural disasters. html: We can't forget the ugly, legally-sanctioned discrimination in our not-so-distant past, or it's link to today's discriminatory voter suppression laws. Next week, we will vote on #HR1, which expands voting rights & ensures every American can exercise their right to vote.
text:
We can't forget the ugly, legally-sanctioned discrimination in our not-so-distant past, or it's link to today's discriminatory voter suppression laws.

Next week, we will vote on #HR1, which expands voting rights & ensures every American can exercise their right to vote.

html: As Acting EPA Director, Andrew Wheeler rolled back critical emissions standards & repealed the Clean Power Plan. Disappointed the Senate confirmed a former coal lobbyist to head the @EPA. I will keep working to protect the regulations that keep our air and water clean.

I will keep working to protect the regulations that keep our air and water clean.

html: I just voted YES on HR 8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act to expand universal background checks and ensure all gun sales & transfers - with a few sensible restrictions - undergoes a background check. No more loopholes. #EndGunViolence
text: I just voted YES on HR 8, the Bipartisan Background Checks Act to expand universal background checks and ensure all gun sales & transfers - with a few sensible restrictions - undergoes a background check. No more loopholes. #EndGunViolence

html: Background checks work. That's why 97% of Americans (including gun owners) support them. It's crucial to close loopholes that allow prohibited persons, whether convicted felons or domestic abusers, from purchasing a firearm online or at a gun show w/o a background check.pic.twitter.com/ZdCiIBaRfQ
text:
Background checks work. That's why 97% of Americans (including gun owners) support them.

It's crucial to close loopholes that allow prohibited persons, whether convicted felons or domestic abusers, from purchasing a firearm online or at a gun show w/o a background check.pic.twitter.com/ZdCiIBaRfQ

html: Oil spills don't just damage our environment, they also handicap the fishing industry & tourism economy. We need greater transparency in granting these waivers so the public can be sure that workers and coastlines are adequately protected.

html: Climate change is a national emergency. Gun violence is a national emergency. There are REAL national emergencies in our country. Immigrants seeking asylum in our country – when immigration at our southern border has fallen 80% since 2000 – is not one of them.
text:
Climate change is a national emergency.

Gun violence is a national emergency.

There are REAL national emergencies in our country. Immigrants seeking  asylum in our country – when immigration at our southern border has fallen 80%  since 2000 – is not one of them.

html: Fabricating a national emergency to divert $ from critical military construction projects, meant to improve dilapidated housing & crumbling roads on bases, does not befit a Commander in Chief. @POTUS is neglecting our servicemembers and their families to build his wall.

Fabricating a national emergency to divert $ from critical military construction projects, meant to improve dilapidated housing & crumbling roads on bases, does not befit a Commander in Chief.

html: Presidents have invoked the National Emergencies Act twice, during Operation Desert Shield & after 9/11. They built airfields, runways, medical facilities & barracks – projects necessary to support our armed forces. A border wall does NOTHING to further our military objectives.

html: Oftentimes, perpetrators display imminent warning signs before carrying out an attack. In #Parkland, the shooter's friend contacted law enforcement to warn them of a potential school shooting. Unfortunately, police had no legal means of temporarily removing his firearms.

html: Sadly, I know the pain gun violence inflicts first-hand. When I was 12, my sister took her own life using a firearm. Then, in 2014 a disturbed gunman in Isla Vista killed 6 people & injured 14 others. We cannot allow these preventable tragedies to become the new normal.
text:
Sadly, I know the pain gun violence inflicts first-hand. When I was 12, my sister took her own life using a firearm. Then, in 2014 a disturbed gunman in Isla Vista killed 6 people & injured 14 others.

We cannot allow these preventable tragedies to become the new normal.

html: To really help America's workers @POTUS can Support the Raise the Wage Act so every American has a living wage. Reform our tax code to benefit the middle-class, not the wealthiest 1%. Not hold federal employees’ paychecks hostage to secure a campaign promise. #SOTU2019
text:
To really help America's workers @POTUS can

 Support the Raise the Wage Act so every American has a living wage.
 Reform our tax code to benefit the middle-class, not the wealthiest 1%.
 Not hold federal employees’ paychecks hostage to secure a campaign promise.

#SOTU2019

html: I’d like to wish everyone on the Central Coast a wonderful New Year, full of joy and hope for the future. This past year was difficult for many Americans as our country seemed to grow even more divided, but as we look forward to the new year there is so much to be hopeful for.
text:
I’d like to wish everyone on the Central Coast a wonderful New Year, full of joy and hope for the future.
 
This past year was difficult for many Americans as our country seemed to grow even more divided, but as we look forward to the new year there is so much to be hopeful for.

html: Nearly 420,000 federal employees – including law enforcement, TSA screeners, Forest Service firefighters & others – are forced to go without pay during the holidays as a result of the #TrumpShutdown. Furloughed federal employees may never receive back-pay after the shutdown ends.

html: I voted against wasteful spending for the wall and remain hopeful that Congress and the President can work together on a bipartisan basis to bring forward a clean spending bill to fund the government responsibly before tonight’s shutdown.
text: I voted against wasteful spending for the wall and remain hopeful that Congress and the President can work together on a bipartisan basis to bring forward a clean spending bill to fund the government responsibly before tonight’s shutdown.

html: The President’s senseless border wall is nothing more than an archaic solution to a 21st century problem and fails to meet our security needs at the border.

html: The Senate passed a bipartisan spending bill, following an agreement w/ @POTUS, which funded the government through Feb. Instead of bringing that clean bill to a vote, House GOP conspired w/ Trump to add funding for a border wall, leading us toward a partial government shutdown.

html: Despite our policy differences, President Bush’s pragmatic & skillful leadership valued compromise, & his presidency brought us the Americans with Disabilities Act as well as improved protections in the Clean Air Act. My thoughts are with President Bush’s family and loved ones.

html: The Covered California open enrollment bus tour stops in San Luis Obispo and Santa Maria tomorrow! Did you know 9 out of 10 people qualify for financial help paying for health insurance? Join my staff and Covered California representatives to find out if you’re eligible.
text:
The Covered California open enrollment bus tour stops in San Luis Obispo and Santa Maria tomorrow!

Did you know 9 out of 10 people qualify for financial help paying for health insurance? Join my staff and Covered California representatives to find out if you’re eligible.

html: After the #ThomasFire & 1/9 Debris Flow, @SBAgov provided nearly $7 million in low interest loans for families & businesses to get back on their feet. Impacted small businesses and private nonprofits can still apply. Submit your application before 10/15: https://disasterloan.sba.gov/ela/

We need to be investing in the next generation of #CentralCoast farmers, not putting their livelihoods at risk with tariffs & an escalating trade war.

Proud to cosponsor the bipartisan VET-2-FARM Act, which creates new job opportunities in the Agriculture industry for veterans.

html: With understaffed VA clinics & a growing need for firefighters, the #CentralCoast knows the importance of recruiting new federal employees. A proposal to bring San Luis Obispo into the LA-Long Beach pay area does just that & impacts nearly 100 federal employees in our community.
text:
With understaffed VA clinics & a growing need for firefighters, the #CentralCoast knows the importance of recruiting new federal employees.

A proposal to bring San Luis Obispo into the LA-Long Beach pay area does just that & impacts nearly 100 federal employees in our community.

html: The #CentralCoast is no stranger to the devastation rising global temperatures bring. This year alone, we witnessed the devastating impacts of the Thomas & Holiday Fires. Right now, first-responders are fighting the #CrucesFire in Lompoc and I am closely monitoring its progress.

html: Glad to hear the bipartisan #GVRO Act has the support of @LEpartnership. Giving law enforcement officers, in conjunction with families & courts, a tool to remove firearms from individuals in crisis is a simple and proven measure to reducing gun violence in our communities.
text:
Glad to hear the bipartisan #GVRO Act has the support of @LEpartnership.

Giving law enforcement officers, in conjunction with families & courts, a tool to remove firearms from individuals in crisis is a simple and proven measure to reducing gun violence in our communities.

html: Cancer unfortunately touches far too many lives, including the youngest and most vulnerable among us. html: This bill is not perfect & I believe we must do more to reduce our nuclear weapon stockpile. However, as an @USMC veteran, I’m proud to play a role in passing key policies that help support the men and women serving our country, including those on the Central Coast.

html: At @CalPoly, students can #LearnByDoing through DoD-Academia partnerships at the High Performance Computing Lab & Electrical and Micro Propulsion Lab. html: It’s unacceptable that female service members aren’t given properly fitted equipment during training. I’m proud to secure $2m increase in funding for female body armor procurement. Thank you @ACLU for your strong support of my amendment & our female troops.pic.twitter.com/VGCwPqEWmR
text: It’s unacceptable that female service members aren’t given properly fitted equipment during training. I’m proud to secure $2m increase in funding for female body armor procurement. Thank you @ACLU for your strong support of my amendment & our female troops.pic.twitter.com/VGCwPqEWmR

html: Our military installations are not immune to the effects of #climatechange. I authored an amendment to strengthen water sustainability & operations readiness by directing the @DeptofDefense to report on innovative ways to reduce water use on our bases.https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce54g1d6c/5r7qg …

html: The Air Force’s decision to downgrade medical certification levels for #Vandenberg AFB Fighters hurts our servicemembers and the surrounding community, which often rely on their services for care. My #NDAA amendment halts this decision until the Air Force explains.pic.twitter.com/EOKS0gYJWw

html: Our military must take into account the growing threat of cyber security attacks. I’m pleased to see that the defense spending package authorizes a National Guard Cyber Security Training Center Pilot Program & builds support for the Cyber Training Complex at Camp San Luis Obispo.pic.twitter.com/uv0Yqsh1fu
text: Our military must take into account the growing threat of cyber security attacks. html: Congress created #TitleX because everyone, regardless of where they live or how much they make, deserves comprehensive reproductive healthcare. I recently wrote to @POTUS, alongside 211 of my colleagues, urging him to maintain the program and will continue to #StandWithPP.pic.twitter.com/5znTGKvVBN
text:
Congress created #TitleX because everyone, regardless of where they live or how much they make, deserves comprehensive reproductive healthcare. 
 
I recently wrote to @POTUS, alongside 211 of my colleagues, urging him to maintain the program and will continue to #StandWithPP.pic.twitter.com/5znTGKvVBN

html: Today marks the anniversary of a tragedy in our own Central Coast community, when a gunman took the lives of 6 UCSB students in #IslaVista & injured 14 others. We must honor the victims w/ action, and protect our schoolchildren by passing legislation to prevent gun violence.pic.twitter.com/jpw3ND7Mcc
text:
Today marks the anniversary of a tragedy in our own Central Coast community, when a gunman took the lives of 6 UCSB students in #IslaVista & injured 14 others.
 
We must honor the victims w/ action, and protect our schoolchildren by passing legislation to prevent gun violence.pic.twitter.com/jpw3ND7Mcc

html: I joined high school students from Parkland and elsewhere who shared personal stories of gun violence with my colleagues & I on the Gun Violence Prevention Task Force. Too many lives have been affected by the uniquely American gun violence epidemic.pic.twitter.com/b3YmwkW2aR
text: I joined high school students from Parkland and elsewhere who shared personal stories of gun violence with my colleagues & I on the Gun Violence Prevention Task Force. Too many lives have been affected by the uniquely American gun violence epidemic.pic.twitter.com/b3YmwkW2aR

html: Today is the four-year anniversary of the shooting in #IslaVista, when a young man with a gun took the lives of six UCSB students & injured 14 others. We know that moments of silence are not enough. We must honor the victims with action. #NotOneMore.pic.twitter.com/HjhiqzkS1W
text:
Today is the four-year anniversary of the shooting in #IslaVista, when a young man with a gun took the lives of six UCSB students & injured 14 others.

We know that moments of silence are not enough. We must honor the victims with action. #NotOneMore.pic.twitter.com/HjhiqzkS1W

html: I’m celebrating National Foster Youth Month by making sure #FosterYouthVoices from across the nation are heard. Thank you, Sarah, for shadowing me today and sharing your experiences and insights into our child welfare system. #FosterYouthShadowDaypic.twitter.com/xPhcfstmpC

html: I stood up today to honor the victims of the #IslaVista shooting at UCSB in 2014. Since Sandy Hook, we've had 46 moments of silence, but still no votes on gun violence prevention measures. It's time to honor these victims with action, not more silence. #EnoughIsEnoughhttps://twitter.com/AmeliaFrappolli/status/998700133477994497 …

I stood up today to honor the victims of the #IslaVista shooting at UCSB in 2014.

html: The traditionally bipartisan #FarmBill has always balanced the priorities of our farmers w/ support for essential food & nutrition programs. Sadly, this year’s bill shirked bipartisanship by drastically cutting the SNAP program, which serves thousands of Central Coast families.
